name: Mr. Happy (UncannyMario)
description:
In Mr. Happy, you play as Mr. Jake Happy and recruit kids. Mr. Jake Happy loves all kids. The more kids you collect, the higher the score. But, watch out for the cops. They think your bad for recruiting these kids.

Controls:

Keys WASD / Arrow Keys - Movement

All sprites, music, and programming made by me.

Child Scream Sound: DemonandAngelLover
